- A few accounts had trouble viewing their bill. Sorry about that, it's now fixed.
- Changing data options had a few copy issues that we fixed to make things clearer.
- Sometimes the Update Credit Card button wouldn't do anything. We made sure it works all the time now.
- We also fixed a few non-trivial crashes.

- A few accounts had trouble viewing their bill. Sorry about that, it's now fixed.
- Changing data options had a few copy issues that we fixed to make things clearer.
- Sometimes the Update Credit Card button wouldn't do anything. We made sure it works all the time now.
- We also fixed a few non-trivial crashes.

- Sometimes the Update Credit Card button wouldn't do anything. We made sure it works all the time now.
- We also fixed a few non-trivial crashes.

Just a quick makeover to start the summer: images were polished, content was cleaned up, and bugs were squashed.
Also, you can now contact us for support using Facebook Messenger

We fixed a bug (sometimes a crash, sometimes an incorrect wait time) in the "talk to us" button that showed up when our servers were misbehaving.  We nuked the crash and the misleading estimate.

- Once you're in, now you can stay! We fixed the problem that required you to log into the app repeatedly.
- Now, when our systems need some downtime for maintenance, our app can let you know.
- We also fixed some formatting and display bugs.

The new version of the Xfinity Mobile app offers a new billing platform and better overall experience—faster, easier access to all your account information.

In addition to the features you're used to, the updated app includes:
- Clearer design
- Simpler billing
- Faster data-option switching
- Easier order cancellation

Note: As we change over to the new billing platform, some data and history may be unavailable.

Good news! We've tweaked a few things since our latest 2.0 release. The new updates are designed to provide a better overall experience — allowing you to access all your account information and features more quickly and easily.

Update to our newest version that includes:

- Clearer design
- More streamlined billing
- Faster data-option switching
- Easier order cancellation
- Simpler calculations for international rates

We’re always working to improve the Xfinity Mobile app. Now you can:

• Get a push notification when your bill is ready.
• Stay in control of your notifications by opting in (or out) directly from the app.

Good news! We're continuing to improve your Xfinity Mobile app experience based on your feedback. Now, with our latest release, you can:

• View current cycle dates on the Activity page
• Suspend a line right from the app
• View more granular data usage. For example: 2.15 GB, rather than just 2.1 GB.

We are so excited about our new By the Gig shared data options, we thought it would be a good time to refresh our app and enhance your overall experience. This includes:

· Fresh designs for our new shared data options
· Updated activity landing page
· New selector for the By the Gig shared data options
· Data usage graphs
· Display of paired devices

We've introduced a new feature directly based on your requests and feedback – you can now use your card on file to pay your monthly Xfinity Mobile bill ahead of your auto-pay date. Additional improvements to Billing are coming, too.

This release also included the usual minor bug fixes.
